summary: This bill, the "Bringing Reliable Investment into Domestic Gulf Energy Production Act of 2025" (BRIDGE Production Act of 2025), mandates the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a minimum number of offshore oil and gas lease sales in the Gulf of America and Cook Inlet Planning Area over a 10-year period. It defines lease sale parameters, allows for waiver of certain requirements, addresses royalty rates, and establishes a pilot program for royalty reductions to incentivize production. The bill also includes provisions related to judicial review and environmental compliance, aiming to streamline the leasing process and promote continuous offshore oil and gas lease sales.
